text: aur (gaib khuda kee taraph se) hukm diya gaya ki ai zameen apana paanee jajb (shokh) kare aur ai aasamaan (barasane se) tham ja aur paanee ghat gaya aur (logon ka) kaam tamaam kar diya gaya aur kashtee jo vahee (pahaad) par ja thaharee aur (chaaro taraph) pukaar diya gaya ki zaalim logon ko (khuda kee rahamat se) dooree ho
